author: Yoram F
title: Excellent hotel. Highly recommended
text:
We spent 4 wonderful nights at the hotel.
We were upgraded from a deluxe room to a junior suite and it was a lovely surprise.
The room is modern and clean. The bed was very comfortable with a selection of pillows. We asked for another feather pillow and received it immediately.
We had 2 large smart TVs in the room and were able to stream our media content into them quite easily.
The bathroom was modern, clean, well-lit and spacious with a large shower, although the water pressure was not the strongest.
The free minibar was a wonderful and useful treat and so was the complimentary Prosecco in the lovely roof top bar.
Breakfast was superb, with a wide selection of bread, cheese, cold cuts, vegetables, fruit, pastry and excellent mozzarella and ricotta served to the table by the staff.
The service is first class by all the staff members we met and the front desk is very knowledgeable and efficient, and will assist with all your requests and needs with a smile.
The location is also very convenient with main attractions within 10-20 minutes walk, It is also close to the underground and bus lines.
There are excellent restaurants within minutes' walking distance of the hotel.
You can't go wrong staying in this hotel!
